message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.MA. 

The paper proposes a new algorithmic scheme for reinforcement learning that can handle a wide class of constraints. This makes it relevant to several sub-categories of computer science, including machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), robotics (cs.RO), systems and control (cs.SY), and multiagent systems (cs.MA). The paper's focus on optimization and control also suggests that it could be relevant to optimization (cs.DS) and numerical analysis (cs.NA). However, given the emphasis on reinforcement learning and the constraints it can handle, we believe that cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, and cs.MA are the most likely sub-categories.
